57b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://87b3541437c8c443ccd36795e56a338ed12855eec17f8da624511b8d1a7e14df","dweb:/ipfs/QmeJQCtZrQjtJLr6u7ZHWeH3pBnjtLWzvRrKViAi7UZqxL"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol":{"keccak256":"0x005ec64c6313f0555d59e278f9a7a5ab2db5bdc72a027f255a37c327af1ec02d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://4ece9f0b9c8daca08c76b6b5405a6446b6f73b3a15fab7ff56e296cbd4a2c875","dweb:/ipfs/QmQyRpyPRL5SQuAgj6SHmbir3foX65FJjbVTTQrA2EFg6L"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/SignedMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5f7e4076e175393767754387c962926577f1660dd9b810187b9002407656be72","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7d533a1c97cd43a57cd9c465f7ee8dd0e39ae93a8fb8ff8e5303a356b081cdcc","dweb:/ipfs/QmVBEei6aTnvYNZp2CHYVNKyZS4q1KkjANfY39WVXZXVoT"]},"src/Faillapop_CoolNFT.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6fd9ab95408e8fe54282a75604f7a70f57d44a8219032f6720156ce0d12c114a","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://3048b611a850ed4ddcf92673297abaf82d61efd9cc5bced166cae0951b079fca","dweb:/ipfs/QmZXvak97W55aTgHgv8fGTF4xZDRxpvQqQPJVnQAM7uM7B"]},"src/interfaces/IFP_CoolNFT.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe46a431e820c326eb4e87b10d69b6e1815bf563cdf9f8f1801015cba0544b8ee","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://01997c13aacb7c19820fa15be19bd5e26ccd8e5e8371b964cbceaf5556bc4afe","dweb:/ipfs/QmWRGzhgDHgMuk5g2ZeipPnScFztS6e9tuGqrw7uT2tnwg"]}},"version":1}

params.owner: The address of the user that will lose his Cool NFTs

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params.to: The address of the user that will receive the Cool NFT

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.daoAddr: The address of the DAO contract

CONTROL_ROLE().notice: The Control Role ID for the AccessControl contract. At first it's the msg.sender and then the DAO.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Cool NFTs cannot be transferred, so this function is overriden to revert

burn(address).notice: DAO can remove all the Cool NFTs from a user

mintCoolNFT(address).notice: Mints a Cool NFT for the user

nextTokenId().notice: The next tokenId to be minted

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Cool NFTs cannot be transferred, so this function is overriden to revert

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Cool NFTs cannot be transferred, so this function is overriden to revert

setDAO(address).notice: Sets the DAO address as the new Control Role

tokenIds(address).notice: Mapping from user address to tokenId

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Cool NFTs cannot be transferred, so this function is overriden to revert
